pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:1.16: I translate in accordance with the findings of Oskar von Hinüber and Bhikkhu Anālayo in their paper “The Robes of a _Bhikkhunī_”.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.12: At this point the Pali reads _Dhammikavagga_ to indicate the last chapter of _pācittiya_ rules for the nuns. This indication is redundant in the present translation, since I have pointed to all the missing rules immediately below, including direct references to their counterparts in the chapter on _pācittiya_ rules for the _bhikkhus_.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc96:2.2.13: At this point the Pali reads _Nandasikkhāpada_ to indicate the last rule in the chapter of _pācittiya_ rules for the nuns. This indication is redundant in the present translation, since I have pointed to all the missing rules immediately below, including direct references to their counterparts in the chapter on _pācittiya_ rules for the _bhikkhus_.
